pluginstrument.author: Snake Stack Simulations
pluginstrument.description:
CESSNA 414AW CHANCELLOR EGT GAUGE
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION "EXTERMINATE THE MICE FROM YOUR COCKPIT!" GitHub: https://simstrumentation.com
Exhaust gas temperature gauge for the Cessna 414AW Chancellor
NOTES: - Designed to match the appearance of the C414, but should work with any dual engine plane in MSFS that requires a dual EGT gauge. - Front bezel glass and internal reflection can be disabled in the user properties
